Description: Limestone ostracon. 11 lines of text on recto containing a letter.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably from the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (244-247, pl.31)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82896) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82896)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 30 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
